summary: A mod that adds a little more life to the village, farm, and city life of Skyrim by having some of the roosters crow at dawn when in appropriate areas.
descriptionHtml:
A mod that adds a little more life to the village, farm, and city life of Skyrim by having some of the roosters crow at dawn when in appropriate areas.

I wanted this mod to be as organic and believable as possible. I chose several different rooster sounds to add a little variation to the rooster crow each morning. Additionally the roosters will not crow at exactly the same time. A rooster crow will occur randomly at a time between 5:45 and 6:45 each morning (on default time scale). I limited the rooster crow to about one rooster per farm, village, and city so as not to overdo the sound effect.

For a video of this mod in action, please check out the below video in which this mod is featured. The clip about Roosters At Dawn begins at 1:33.

[youtube]af6NATVU8jA[/youtube]

I am open to suggestions, feed back, and bug reports.

Enjoy!
author: schmidte
